Package main.java.model.brick

Class SpecialBrick

java.lang.Object
main.java.model.brick.Brick
main.java.model.brick.SpecialBrick
public class SpecialBrick
extends Brick
Represents a special type of brick with unique properties or behaviors, such as additional durability or effects when hit.
Author:
Emily
